short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to convert dimensions between imperial and metric.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Want to convert inches to millimeters or centimeters?  This tool allows the user to convert dimensions between imperial and metric in a quick and simple way.
